title: Boson propagator under rigid rotation; Mode expansion approach
abstract:
To explore how rigid rotation affects the thermodynamic properties of free
relativistic bosons, we employ the standard imaginary time formalism of thermal
field theory to calculate the free propagator of complex scalar fields under
rotation. We introduce the corresponding partition function and explicitly
compute it by expanding the modes in cylindrical coordinates. The resulting
propagator is in full agreement with similar findings in the existing
literature.
